metadata.title: USN-3780-1 -- HAProxy vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HAProxy incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3780-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2 haproxy-doc - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2 vim-haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
